channel.title: LANGUAGE Help Please!?
channel.description: OK so i am trying to start me a server up and i finally found a source and client. So i made my account (Skullbandit) and i made what my guy looks like and i pressed the logout button. So i went to my SOURCE file, then went to Characters-->Mainsave-->Skullbandit(Edit). When it opened up it was all Chinese letters and only language i know is English(Sadly). There was another file that i Edited names Test and it was all english but I did not make that account. I copy and pasted Test onto Skullbandit so it was in english but i guess the password was coded so when i went to change the password it was not right and i couldnt log in (good thing i copied the chinese letters so i could put it back. Also a game i was trying to make awhile back was doing this so i gave up on it. I have worked really hard on this one and am definatelly not quitting it can anyone help me Change language or any suggestions please?!?!? THANKS, Skullbandit

item.title: LANGUAGE Help Please!?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Why don’t you save the .dat file as a different extension?

Read full topic

item.title: LANGUAGE Help Please!?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Chances are, the server writes the player object. So unless you know exactly which bytes to change, you could end up making your account file unreadable.

Read full topic

[quote=“skullbandit1209, post:9, topic:392869”]No you had to open up wordpad and save as .txt but close guess and thanks to everyone who helped me figure this out[/quote]Pretty much what I said lol…“open up .dat file” meant to use notepad++

item.title: LANGUAGE Help Please!?
item.dc:creator: @skullbandit1209 skullbandit1209
item.description:
@skullbandit1209 wrote:

OK so i am trying to start me a server up and i finally found a source and client. So i made my account (Skullbandit) and i made what my guy looks like and i pressed the logout button. So i went to my SOURCE file, then went to Characters–>Mainsave–>Skullbandit(Edit). When it opened up it was all Chinese letters and only language i know is English(Sadly). There was another file that i Edited names Test and it was all english but I did not make that account. I copy and pasted Test onto Skullbandit so it was in english but i guess the password was coded so when i went to change the password it was not right and i couldnt log in (good thing i copied the chinese letters so i could put it back. Also a game i was trying to make awhile back was doing this so i gave up on it. I have worked really hard on this one and am definatelly not quitting it can anyone help me Change language or any suggestions please???
THANKS, Skullbandit
